last_episode_to_air.name: When Will Met Sylvia
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tensions flare between Sylvia and Will at a housewarming party.

name: Platonic
overview: A platonic pair of former best friends approaching midlife reconnect after a long rift. The duo’s friendship becomes more consuming—and destabilizes their lives in a hilarious way.
tagline: Old friends reunite for a hilarious new chapter.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: After a long rift in their friendship, Sylvia reunites with her old best friend, the newly divorced Will.

episodes.name: Gandalf the Lizard
episodes.overview: Will accompanies Sylvia to an open house. Sylvia helps Will sneak into his ex-wife’s home to get the rest of his stuff and make a clean emotional break.

episodes.name: Partner’s Retreat
episodes.overview: While Sylvia’s husband attends a conference, she spends the day getting drunk with Will—who informs her about a development with his bar.

episodes.name: Divorce Party
episodes.overview: Sylvia throws a divorce party for Will to cheer him up, but it gets out of hand when his rowdy friends try to take control of the night.

episodes.name: My Wife’s Boyfriend
episodes.overview: Unnerved by the closeness of Will’s relationship with Sylvia, Charlie invites Will to join him and his coworkers at a baseball game.

episodes.name: The Big Two Six
episodes.overview: Will introduces Sylvia to his much younger girlfriend, Peyton—then gets upset when Sylvia hires her as a babysitter.

episodes.name: Let the River Run
episodes.overview: Sylvia struggles to keep up with the brutal pace at her new law firm. Will learns about Reggie and Andy’s new plans.

episodes.name: San Diego
episodes.overview: Will and the guys take Sylvia on a business trip to San Diego. Charlie grows more suspicious about Sylvia and Will’s relationship.

episodes.name: Slumber Party
episodes.overview: Frustrated by how much time Sylvia is spending with Will, Charlie crosses a line. Will confronts Reggie and Andy.

episodes.name: When Will Met Sylvia
episodes.overview: Tensions flare between Sylvia and Will at a housewarming party.
